citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 04:30 p.m. on
21-Feb-20.
Called owner at listed number, waited 30 minutes, owner called back unable to accompany inspector due to change
in optimal hours. Discussed new optimal hours with owner for future inspections..

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

in optimal hours.  Discussed new optimal hours with owner for future inspections..
